description: We are the ORIGINAL NIAGARA FALLS DAY TOUR, family owned and operated since 1993! We have safely and successfully carried over a quarter million passengers from Toronto to Niagara Falls and back. Our mission is very clear; "to provide the most value for your hard earned time and money". Our tour has the best timeline, we do not waste your time with unwanted souvenir stops or long lines. We depart before the others and return well before your evening plans, guaranteed! Our tour guides are handpicked to deliver big laughs, important facts and fond memories. On tour with us you will enjoy informative & entertaining commentary, Stopover at Niagara on the Lake, breathtaking guided photo stops along Niagara River Parkway, ticket onto WORLD FAMOUS HORNBLOWER BOAT CRUISE + 3hrs free time away from the group to enjoy lunch, shopping, pictures, casino or relaxing by the falls. Our formula for long standing success has often been duplicated but yet to be replicated. We hope to see you soon!

reviews.title: Truly wonderful
text: This tour guide attracts people from all over the world, and I had just as much fun learning about them and their country as I did seeing the falls. The trip itself is beautiful and our tour guide was knowledgeable and helpful. My phone was low battery at the falls and I had to turn it off which resulted in me losing track of time having so much fun. Luckily i turned my phone on just in time for him to call me and get me back to our meeting spot only 5 mins late. He then charged my phone for me so i wouldn’t get stranded in downtown toronto - truly great service! Thank you for being a part of my trip to toronto and niagara falls!

reviews.title: Perfect day
text: The trip was simply amazing from start to finish. The tour guide Edward was excellent and was very helpful and kept us well informed on all the places we visited. The boat trip on the falls was awesome. Would recommend this trip as a perfect way to visit Niagara Falls.

reviews.title: Niagara Falls, a must see!
text: It was an amazing day! Took plenty of pictures. Our guide was very knowledgeable and fun. Highly recommend! Put this on your bucket list!

reviews.title: Fun day out of Toronto!
text: We had an amazing tour with Edward (tour guide) and Roman (driver), they were very entertaining. I would highly recommend this tour. We were lucky with the beautiful weather and fall leaves on full display. Please be sure to leave a tip for your guides. Also, just a note that there was only one pick up location (no hotel pick ups).

reviews.title: Brilliant day out!
text: Fantastic day Michael gave a in depth humourous tour with no bull! giving the "inside line" on all stops and with a in depth knowledge on all places  visited. The  pace of the tour was just right, being the right amount of time allocated to each stop. The Driver(Roman) was master of his craft a faster, Safer, smoother bus driver I have yet to use. Michael at first may seem firm but he had everyone on point back at the bus on time at each stop. The whole day ran like clockwork even negotiating the Horrendous Toronto Traffic. Picked up and dropped off professionally
A fantastic day experiencing and learning many more things than expected well worth the money.
Brother Brown from Yorkshire

reviews.title: Niagara on the Lake and Niagara Falls trip
text: Great guide who was very informative. He was happy to take photos of groups and was assertive with a small group who were being disrespectful to other guests and himself to ensure that everyone enjoyed the trip. Although we had visited Niagara before, this trip gave us slightly different experiences to enjoy ( the river at Niagara on the Lake and the Whirlpool) which was good. He also signposted the deli in the visitor centre at the Falls which had a much better selection and was much better value.

reviews.title: Simply the best!
text: Michael was one of the best tour guides we've ever had.  Knowledgeable,  friendly,  and made sure everyone had a great time.

reviews.title: Don’t do this tour with a tour company.
text: We did this tour today. Absolute waste of time. We calculated we were in the coach forn5 hours. The falls could have been done independently in a car by ourselves. Instead we took a long arduous coach trip. Stopping at totally irrelevant stops. IE: a 45 min stop in a horrible maple syrup tasting place that had cafes which were like a truck stop. Terrible food. I’m guessing the company had commissions with this place. A lot of hanging around. The traffic getting back into Toronto city at 6.30 was dreadful planning an we crawled along which took two hours. Never again will I take an organised tour. Do it independently it’s way quicker and much less hanging around. We used Kings tours through Viator. Please don’t bother. Not worth the time money or exhaustion.

reviews.title: Michael made Niagara not enjoyable
text: Unfortunately we had our tour on the same day as the marathon. This made getting to the pick up point difficult. So our tour guide, Michael, called us at the pick up time asking where we were. He cussed at us, told us our Lyft driver was the worst ever (he was working his butt off with unexpected road closures), told us 100 people were waiting on us (it was 22), cussed at us again, and hung up with a “we leave at 8:20” warning. We got there by 8:20, having gotten out of the Lyft and run the last 4 blocks through closed roads, and the guide video recorded us running up to the bus as he was laughing at us! We weren’t even the only ones running behind due to the traffic. He then proceeded to have sexual jokes, rude jokes, make very direct requests to go to the ATM to get him a tip, and overall was not humorous or interesting. And the constant honking… wow. For no reason. The kicker, at the end when getting off the bus I said thank you but didn’t offer him a tip and he said “I waited for you and you won’t leave one?” And I just walked away. Ridiculous. I would fire people like that if they worked for me doing customer service. Awful treatment of his passengers. I do not recommend.

reviews.title: Best way to experience the Falls.
text: On time.  Comfortable transportation.  Great tour guide.  Great sites to see.  Well managed all around.  Good history of area.

reviews.title: Great visit to Niagara Falls from Toronto.
text: This tour met all my expectations. The guide was very informative and entertaining. He gave us good instructions and everything ran smoothly with our stops along the way and with the visit to the Falls. We had a lot of free time to sightsee and shop and the boat ride was the highlight.

reviews.title: Best way to spend the day in Niagara Falls
text: Very fun day exploring Niagara Falls with our guide Michael and driver Roman! Michael was full of interesting facts about the different areas we visited and kept our tour laughing and right on schedule all day. It was a full Canada mist the day we visited, so even at the brink we got quite wet - prepare to be soaked on the boat ride! The Falls themselves are stunning, and the town of Niagara on the Lake is super cute with lots of shops for all your Falls themes trinkets. If you’re looking to go from Toronto to Niagara Falls, we would definitely recommend the fastest and funniest tour out there!

reviews.title: Well worth it!
text: Chose a lovely day, great experience recommend Niagara on the lake,  whirlpool was good. Hornblower is a must. Tony the driver was informative with a dry wit.

reviews.title: Don't miss this opportunity
text: This was an experience not to miss. The scenery, foliage, and stop off to look at unique scenic stops, picture opportunities and time in Niagara Falls on the Lake was wonderful. This was one of the bucket list, enjoyed the small group size.The tour guide was very  informative and helpful.  Prepare to get wet this is not just a mist ! But it was well worth it.

I was surprised that the history on the tour started at "colonisation" and at NO stage was anything shared about the First Nations people and their connection to the land and water ways nor were we directed to authentic first nations outlets ( was really shocked that F.N. people not mentioned at all). This would be unacceptable in other commonwealth countries like Aus. or NZ

reviews.title: Great trip to Niagara Falls
text: Our guide, Tony, was great. He gave us lots of information. Unfortunately there was a hold-up on the highway heading to Niagara-on-the-Lake, so we only had 45mins there. We could have spent half a day there. Everything else was well organised and we loved the Falls.
Note - the roads a very bumpy and the old bus needs some suspension work.

reviews.title: Avoid fighting traffic yourself and instead relax on the bus with this great tour.
text: We didn't want to rent a car or take the train since the Niagara station isn't close to the falls, so this tour was a great option.   The tour departed from a convenient spot near Union Station and Alex our guide provided a humorous running commentary the whole way to the falls, while Harvey safely drove the bus.  The tour stops at Niagara on the Lake for about an hour as well at Niagara Gorge & Mighty Whirlpool Rapids for a photo stop before arriving at the falls.  We had about 3 hours to take the Hornblower trip, eat lunch and walk down to see horseshoe falls, which is just about right for those activities.  Only downside is there isn't time to go to the butterfly conservatory as it is not near the falls.

reviews.title: Great tour and views with enough free time
text: A great tour out to Niagara Falls with Hornblower boat trip. With a stop at Niagara on the lake also, as well as a quick visit to the floral clock.
Friendly and knowledgeable driver. Giving you fun stats and history on the outward journey. On the return you were left to sleep or look out the window.
Niagara on the lake was a beautiful town. Disneyesque in its perfection, with flowers everywhere and cute shops.
UP on arrival at the falls, the driver took you through the area, so you could get your bearings and see what there was to walk back to.
Then taken back to the parking location and your escorted down to the boat trip if chosen
Hornblower tour was great. windy and wet. Ponchos keep the majority of you wet, but the water still sneaks in. You definitely know you've been under Niagara Falls when you get off.
After the above, just over 3 hours to wander and snap photos, shoot video or shop as you please

Would have been nice to have a Mississauga pick up, even at one hotel if Im honest. Traffic in the morning was bad, and took way longer than I thought. So do allow for that if coming in from out of town. I ended up doing some roads of Toronto 4 times due to my location.

reviews.title: Visit Niagara Falls
text: Was amazing, the view is something that you can’t get in other place, the food, the services, the city all together make you feel an incredible experience

reviews.title: Super fun trip!
text: Had an amazing day with my daughter!
Alex and Harvey were super fun and told so many interesting stories.
Will recommend this tour to all I know travelling to Toronto 👌🏼

reviews.title: An enjoyable trip
text: Overall, it was a very enjoyable trip.  More than an adequate amount of time at the Niagara Falls.  My only issue was a very rough ride.

reviews.title: Exceptional Niagara Falls Tour
text: Michael (tour guide) and Harvey (driver) where great a got us to each destination safely and on time. Michael’s knowledge, not only at Niagara, but en-route was exceptional. And his knowledge was delivered factually but with great humour ( and in several languages) and kept everybody engaged and on time. Well done to both and I would highly recommend this tour!

reviews.title: Felix was the best guide!
text: Felix was the best!  Our first time visiting Toronto and we planned this trip originally for a Sunday afternoon.  After checking the weather a few days ahead, we were able to conveniently change our tour for Saturday.  As they mostly told us that we would be back in Toronto by 5 p.m., I would allow for extra time to make your way back due to traffic...especially if there are major sporting events happening that weekend.  We were delayed getting back and had to change our dinner plans, but Felix was always keeping the tour on time and make sure we were well taken care of.  The actual tour was amazing, and it is something I would hope everybody could experience.  Lots of time to explore the Niagara Falls area and several great stops along the way.

reviews.title: Brilliant day out with Alex
text: Had the most brilliant day tour from Toronto to Niagara Falls. Our tour guide was very professional and very informative. The running of the tour went exactly to plan, our driver Roman was professional and you felt safe. The actual day was great fun especially having the Niagara boat tour included. I would recommend this tour company.

reviews.title: great trip with Tony
text: Great trip to Niagra yesterday with Tony. Knowledgeable, fun & interactive guide. lots of short stops at the floral clock, whirlpool etc which broke up the journey. perfect amount of time at the falls to do the Hornblower boat ride & have lunch. really good tour & worth the money

reviews.title: Awe inspiring one day sight seeing and Niagara Falls Boat cruise, not to be missed!
text: The Niagara Falls one day tour from Toronto with the Hornblower Boat Cruise was fantastic and the highlight of our stay in Toronto.

We had a number of stops on our way to the Niagara Falls including at Niagara On The Lake a beautiful, peaceful and historic town after the hustle and bustle of Toronto. We also stopped at the Whirlpool Falls and the hydroelectric dams on the Niagara River.
Tony, our guide was great, a font of local knowledge and history and he looked after us really well and explained everything perfectly.
The highlight of the day and our last stop was the Niagara Falls and Boat Cruise and it will not disappoint. It is truly awe inspiring!

reviews.title: Refreshing Falls Showe in Niagra after flight
text: Took red eye from Vancouver so was great to sit back & let Edward & Roman take care of driving & everything. Bus was comfy & on time. Edward gave us awesome tips on countryside & some history that was entertaining particularly from a local’s perspective. Kept us all on time with gentle stories & reminders. Niagra is truly worth seeing as was Niagra-on-the-lake with a few stops added in. Highly recommend this tour & comp

reviews.title: An amazing day out with a professional team
text: The whole day experience was amazing. Seeing little towns and villages along the way was great. The commentary provided by the guide was excellent. He (Alex) was a real character and kept the tour group informed and entertained all day. I recommend the experience.

reviews.title: Family-friendly, enjoyable, and stress-free way to enjoy the Niagara Falls
text: Friendly and helpful guide and driver! Very much enjoyed our bus tour! Departed as planned, visited all places as advertised, the guide explained everything well, and had sufficient time to visit.

reviews.title: Recommend to everyone in the world as in front line hoteliers ,, very enjoyable
text: September is best month to visit Niagara Falls it’s  summers I really enjoyed with my Canadian  friends it was my birthday red raincoat with. Last trip to Niagara fall by boat life time memorable experience for me
Staff was friendly  helpful,,,, I love it with my friends

reviews.title: Great value.  Hornblower ride worth the whole trip.
text: Along the way, Alex gave a ton of info about Toronto and the Falls.  His non-stop stories might not be for everyone, but I enjoyed them.  The Hornblower boat ride into the mist was super-fun.  Alex's tip to go to the lower level in front was spot-on.  Being "inside" the falls at river level was a fantastic experience.  Also, Niagara on the Lake was actually scenic and charming, not like so many of the fake, tourist trappy places I've been.  Would like to have spent more time there just to enjoy the park-like setting.  Also would have liked a stop at the Floral Clock, not just a drive-by.

reviews.title: Couldn't have asked for a better tour. Tour guide, Alex, was first cladd
text: Fantastic tour with a couple of stops for photo opportunities on the way. Boat trip is a must. Views and scenery are amazing

reviews.title: A very nice experience
text: It was a very well-organized trip. The guide was very nice. During our trip to Niagara, he gave us a lot of information about Canada and Niagara. He was very fun as well.
We had 1 hour time in Niagara on Lake town and 3 hours at the Niagara waterfall (including the boat).

reviews.title: Lovely tour of Niagra-on-the-lake and the falls!
text: We absolutely loved our tour with Tony who was friendly, funny and knowledgeable. He got us around safely, showed and taught us a lot along the way about history of Niagara falls and the surroundings, and was eager to help in any way needed.

reviews.title: Great Trip, Great Value
text: Just fabulous!  Edward, our tour guide, was so impressive, with his knowledge and enthusiasm, sharing as much as he could in the time available. Entertaining with his anecdotes, we learned so much local history on the way that the miles just flew by.
Although the itinerary was busy, there was enough time at each stop for photos, or comfort breaks, or eats, without being rushed.
The highlight was of course the Falls themselves, the boat trip being more impressive than we could have imagined.
We loved every minute!  Good value too!  Thoroughly recommend!
Thank you Niagra and Toronto Tours

reviews.title: Great day out to the Falls
text: Excellent day out to the Falls, stopping at Niagara on the Lake, the Floral Clock and the Whirlpool rapids on the way. The boat ride into the Falls was great - you could choose to stay on the lower deck or inside where you didn’t get as wet or you could go for the ‘full exoerience’ and ride on the top deck where you do get soaked. They give you ponchos which keep the top part of you dry at least. Three hours at the Falls was just right to do the boat ride, walk around and have lunch. Our driver/guide, Tony, was very knowledgeable and fun

reviews.title: Fantastic day at Niagara
text: Amazing! Tony the driver was so interesting, knowledgeable and helpful
Excellent driver and the whole tour was a great experience. The boat part is a real thrill and the ponchos help. We stayed on the main deck, the upper deck you get a bit wetter
Altogether a great day and well worth the expenditure, would highly recommend
Leslie Liston (BC)

reviews.title: Fun day, good itinerary, but logistics could use a little work
text: We are very happy we did the falls via tour instead of handling it ourselves for full relaxation on where to go, park, handle Toronto traffic.  The chosen spots were excellent and we generally had enough time (though more at Niagara-on-the-Lake and less at the bathroom stop or lunch near the falls might have been nice). Hornblower boat ride was our favorite!

Logistics could use some improvement though - we arrived at the meeting spot at 8:15am only to sit on the bus in the city for nearly 45 minutes before leaving. It felt like a few booking companies were funneled to the same bus.  Maybe because of the late start, we were over an hour late getting back to the city.  I understand the traffic situation, but I found it a little frustrating because we were so late leaving Toronto in the morning and the website was so insistent on return before 5pm.

reviews.title: Excellent day tour to Niagara Falls
text: This was a very good day tour, we were very pleased we chose this company to visit Niagara Falls. Eddie, our guide and driver, was fabulous. He had a wealth of local knowledge and took us to the best places to view the falls and other local highlights, while staying away from all the usual tourist traps.

reviews.title: Best one day tour in town
text: Great day out with our guide, Michael, visiting historical  Niagara on the lake on the way.  He was very knowledgeable, answering all our questions, and plenty of laughs too.

reviews.title: Niagara falls tour
text: The whole tour was amazing with some great views and a even better tour guide thanks for this wonderful trip and great adventure
